DOC.brief_summary: Learning self-manage urine flow may help people prevent minimize persistent complication long-term indwelling urethral suprapubic catheter .
DOC.detailed_description: Urinary catheter user commonly experience adverse health effect , urinary tract infection ( UTI ) , blockage , dislodgement , leakage , lead poor quality life indicator . Catheter-related problem often require health care utilization result increase health care cost . Self-management urine flow essential part self-care people long-term urinary catheter may lead prevention reduction catheter-related problem improve quality life.This study test effectiveness urinary catheter self-management intervention randomize trial 220 patient , 12 month follow-up . The experimental intervention design enhance self-management urine flow individual long-term urinary catheter , goal decrease catheter relate complication enhance quality life .
DOC.criteria: Have indwell urethral suprapubic catheter expect use least one year . Live Central Western New York State ( Utica Buffalo region approximately ) OR care Visiting Nurse Service New York City . Able complete study measurement alone help family member caregiver . Able communicate study personnel English . Have access telephone data collection . Terminally ill Cognitively impair No catheter associate UTI within previous 12 month NOR blockage NOR dislodgement previous 6 month ( people catheter 12 month )
